item.title: CV
item.description: Education Master of Communication, Nanjing University, September 2017-present Supervisor: Prof. Naipeng Chao co-supervised by Prof. Cheng-Jun Wang Bachelor of Communication, Sun Yet-san University, September 2013-June 2017 GPA:4.0/5.0 (5⁄61) Exchange study, City University of Hong Kong, August 2015-December 2015 Summer School, University of Westminster(UK), July 2015-August 2015 Research Interests Computational communication Computational social science Health communication Publications Scholarships Honor for Academic Excellence, 2013-2015
